
{{alias}}( obj, path )
    Check whether an object contains a nested key path.

    Parameters
    ----------
    obj: ObjectLike
        Input object.

    path: string|Array
        Key path.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.sep: string (optional)
        Key path separator. Default: '.'.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating if an obj has a specified path.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = { 'a': { 'b': { 'c': 'd' } } };
    > var bool = {{alias}}( obj, 'a.b.c' )
    true

    // Specify a custom separator via the `sep` option:
    > var obj = { 'a': { 'b': { 'c': 'd' } } };
    > var bool = {{alias}}( obj, 'a/b/c', { 'sep': '/' } )
    true

{{alias}}.factory( path[, options] )
    Creates a reusable deep has own function.

    Parameters
    ----------
    path: string|Array
        Key path.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.sep: string (optional)
        Key path separator. Default: '.'.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Function
        Deep has own factory.

    Examples
    --------
    > var dHasOwn = {{alias}}.factory( 'a/b/c', { 'sep': '/' } );
    > var obj = { 'a': { 'b': { 'c': 'd' } } };
    > var bool = dHasOwn( obj )
    true

    See Also
    --------
